mapper.select:
SELECT
gm.id, gm.receive_money_account, gm.receive, gm.remark, gm.time_of_receiving_money, gm.send_money_account,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(gm.remark, '#', 2), '#',-1) AS address_remark,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(gm.remark, '^',2), '^', -1) AS feefor_remark
FROM get_money gm
ORDER BY gm.time_of_receiving_money DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO get_money ( receive_money_account, receive, remark, time_of_receiving_money, send_money_account ) VALUES ( #{receiveMoneyAccount}, #{receive}, #{remark}, #{timeOfReceivingMoney}, #{sendMoneyAccount} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, receive_money_account AS receiveMoneyAccount, receive, remark, time_of_receiving_money AS timeOfReceivingMoney FROM get_money WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT gm.receive_money_account AS receiveMoneyAccount, gm.receive, gm.time_of_receiving_money AS timeOfReceivingMoney,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(gm.remark, '#', 2), '#',-1) AS address_remark,
SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(gm.remark, '^',2), '^', -1) AS feefor_remark,
gm.remark, gm.send_money_account AS sendMoneyAccount FROM get_money gm WHERE gm.receive_money_account = #{account} AND gm.time_of_receiving_money > CURDATE() - INTERVAL 365 DAY ORDER BY gm.time_of_receiving_money DESC

SELECT tm.account, tm.transfer, tm.balance, gm.id, gm.receive_money_account AS receiveMoneyAccount, gm.receive,
gm.remark, gm.time_of_receiving_money AS timeOfReceivingMoney FROM transfer_money tm JOIN get_money gm ON gm.receive_money_account = tm.account AND gm.receive = tm.transfer WHERE gm.receive_money_account = #{account} AND gm.receive = #{receive} ORDER BY gm.time_of_receiving_money DESC
